description: Detects the use of various web request methods (including aliases) via Windows PowerShell command Author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Use of Get-Command and Get-Help modules to reference Invoke-WebRequest and Start-BitsTransfer.
name: Windows PowerShell Web Request
